html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-02852013-03-07,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations (Prince Edward Island)
PrecisRegulations Amending VARIOUS GST/HST REGULATIONS (PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND) in order to amend existing GST/HST regulations made under the Excise Tax Act to formalize and give legal effect to Prince Edward Island's decision to adopt the HST. Housekeeping amendments to existing GST/HST regulations are also included.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0044 Publication Date: 2013-03-27
AttachmentsAttachment
